Name: Detective Failure
About the game: 'This is the best game since The Witcher 3' - No one ever. 'Definitely Worth 3$' - Could be you. Detective Failure is a Puzzle game without puzzles!* Murder mystery game with 11 significanty different endings! Game created with RPG Maker MV that has no aspects of an RPG! Oldschool point-and-click game moved to a 2D. * - Game might actually have puzzles.
